events.details: Dr. Hawthorne starts selling catalyst research to Hexton Pharmaceuticals through shell company
Dr. Vasquez notices patterns in competitor's research matching their internal projects
events.evidence_created: Personal investigation notes, USB backup files
events.significance: Elena becomes threat to Hawthorne's operation

events.details: Hawthorne notices Elena accessing security logs and financial records
events.significance: Hawthorne decides Elena must be eliminated

events.details: Hawthorne threatens to report Marcus's sister's immigration status unless he steals research
events.significance: Sets up Marcus as patsy for murder

events.event: Marcus forced to deliver stolen research
events.details: Marcus reluctantly gives Hawthorne Elena's latest catalyst formulas
events.significance: Evidence that makes Marcus look guilty

events.event: Elena confronts Marcus about missing research
events.details: Elena realizes research is missing and suspects Marcus
events.significance: Creates apparent motive for Marcus to kill Elena

events.details: Hawthorne uses security equipment to clone Marcus's keycard
events.significance: Enables Hawthorne to frame Marcus for murder

events.details: Elena gives Sarah backup USB drive, warns someone high up is involved

events.event: Hawthorne arrives at work, prepares poison
events.details: Hawthorne prepares potassium cyanide solution from personal chemistry set
Elena reviews financial records, preparing to expose Hawthorne
events.significance: Shows Elena was close to exposing Hawthorne

events.details: Marcus comes to work, anxious about previous day's confrontation

events.event: Hawthorne plants evidence in Marcus's locker
events.details: Hawthorne places Elena's stolen research notes in Marcus's locker
Elena orders her usual coffee from lab café
Hawthorne tells Tom he's going to check perimeter, leaves office
events.significance: Hawthorne has no alibi for murder time

events.details: Hawthorne poisons Elena's coffee before it reaches her lab
events.evidence_created: Poison residue, coffee stain on research notes

events.event: Hawthorne uses cloned card to enter lab
events.details: Hawthorne uses Marcus's cloned keycard to enter Lab 7B
events.significance: Creates false evidence of Marcus's presence

events.details: Elena drinks poisoned coffee while reviewing research
Elena collapses and dies within 5 minutes of ingesting poison
Hawthorne uses admin access to alter timestamps on security footage
events.significance: Covers up his presence, frames Marcus

events.details: Hawthorne places original keycard to create false timeline
Hawthorne returns to security office, acts normal
events.significance: Hawthorne tries to establish partial alibi

events.details: Security guard Tom Bradley finds Elena dead during routine patrol
Police review security footage, Marcus appears to be in lab at time of murder
Police arrest Marcus based on security footage and planted evidence

timeline_verification.consistency_check: All events fit logically within timeframe
timeline_verification.witness_knowledge: Witnesses know only what they would see at specific times
timeline_verification.technology_constraints: Digital evidence manipulation fits technical capabilities
timeline_verification.physical_constraints: All movements are physically possible within timeframe

key_timeline_insights.alibi_gap: Hawthorne has no alibi from 3:00-4:30 PM
key_timeline_insights.evidence_planting: Multiple evidence planting opportunities before discovery
key_timeline_insights.witness_timing: Tom can verify Hawthorne's absence from security office
